src: „Turime 4 mėnesių amžiaus peles, kurios sirgo diabetu, o dabar neserga“, – pridūrė jis.
mt: “We have four-month-old puppies that were sick with diabetes, and now they don’t,” he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Halifakse (Naujoji Škotija) įsikūrusio Dalhauzio universiteto medicinos profesorius ir Kanados diabeto asociacijos mokslinio padalinio vadovas dr. Ehudas Uras įspėjo, kad moksliniai tyrimai dar tik prasideda.
mt: Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chairman of the scientific panel of the Canadian Diabetes Association, warned that scientific research is just beginning.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Kaip ir kai kurie kiti ekspertai, jis skeptiškai vertina galimybę išgydyti diabetą ir atkreipia dėmesį, kad šie duomenys netaikomi sergantiesiems 1 tipo diabetu.
mt: As with some other experts, he is skeptical of the possibility of curing diabetes and points out that these data are not applicable to patients with type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Pirmadienį Švedijos akademijos Nobelio literatūros komiteto nuolatinė sekretorė Sara Danius Švedijos radijo „Sveriges Radio“ laidoje viešai paskelbė, kad šiam komitetui nepavyko tiesiogiai susisiekti su Bobu Dylanu dėl laimėtos 2016 m. Nobelio literatūros premijos ir komitetas daugiau su juo susisiekti nebandys.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Literature Committee, announced on Swedish radio that the committee had been unable to directly contact Bob Dylan regarding the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature and would not be trying again.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: S. Danius sakė: „Dabar nedarome nieko. Skambinau ir siunčiau el. laiškus jo artimiausiam partneriui ir gavau labai draugiškus atsakymus. Šiam laikui to tikrai užtenka.“
mt: S. Danius said: "We are not doing anything now. I am calling and sending emails to his closest partner and I got very friendly responses. This will suffice for now."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Anksčiau „Ring“ vadovas Jamie Siminoffas pastebėjo, kad įmonė buvo įkurta, nes jis negirdėjo savo garaže esančios parduotuvės durų skambučio.
mt: Previously, "Ring" CEO Jamie Siminoff noticed the company was founded because he didn't hear the doorbell in his store.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Jis pasakė, kad įrengė „WiFi“ durų skambutį.
mt: He said he installed a "WiFi" doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminofas teigė, kad pardavimai po jo pasirodymo „Shark Tank“ epizode 2013 m., kuriame laidos žiuri atsisakė finansuoti startuolį, šoktelėjo į viršų.
mt: 2013 sales after his appearance on the ABC show Shark Tank, where the show's investors rejected his pitch, skyrocketed.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017 m. pabaigoje Siminoffas pasirodė prekybos televizijos kanale „QVC“.
mt: 2017 saw Siminoff appear on the shopping television channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Taip pat „Ring“ susitarė be teismo su konkuruojančia saugos įmone „ADT Corporation“.
mt: The company also settled with its rival security company ADT Corporation without going to court.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Nors atrodo, kad viena eksperimentinė vakcina gali sumažinti mirtingumą nuo Ebolos, iki šiol nėra aiškiai įrodyta, kad kokie nors vaistai būtų tinkami esamai infekcijai gydyti.
mt: While one experimental vaccine may reduce mortality from Ebola, no drugs have been proven effective in treating the current outbreak.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Vienas antikūnių mišinių, ZMapp, iš pradžių teikė vilčių šioje srityje, bet atlikti tyrimai parodė, kad jis nėra toks veiksmingas, siekiant išvengti mirčių, kaip buvo manyta.
mt: One of the antiviral cocktails, ZMapp, initially held promise in this area, but studies showed it was not as effective as hoped in preventing deaths.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Per PALM bandymą, ZMapp buvo naudojamas kaip kontrolė, tai reiškia, kad mokslininkai jį naudojo kaip pradinį tašką ir su juo lygino kitus tris gydymo būdus.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning researchers used it as a baseline and compared it to the other three treatment methods.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: „USA Gymnastics“ pritaria JAV olimpinio komiteto laiškui ir sutinka, kad olimpinei šeimai yra būtina skatinti saugią aplinką visiems sportininkams.
mt: USA Gymnastics agrees with the U.S. Olympic Committee's letter and agrees that it is important to encourage a safe environment for all athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Sutinkame su Jungtinių Valstijų olimpinio ir paralimpinio komiteto (USOC) teiginiu, kad mūsų sportininkų ir klubų interesų ir jų sporto labui padėtų reikšmingi pokyčiai mūsų organizacijoje, o ne organizacijos panaikinimas.
mt: We agree with the United States Olympic and Paralympic Committee's assertion that significant changes to our organization would be in the best interests of our athletes and clubs, not the dissolution of our organization.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: „USA Gymnastics“ remia nepriklausomą tyrimą, kuris gali atskleisti, kaip tokio masto išnaudojimas, apie kurį drąsiai papasakojo Larry'o Nassaro aukos, galėjo tokį ilgą laiką likti nepastebėtas, ir yra pasirengusi taikyti būtinus ir tinkamus pakeitimus.
mt: USA Gymnastics is supporting an independent investigation that could reveal how such abuse, as Nassar's victims have courageously recounted, could have gone undetected for so long, and is prepared to take necessary and appropriate action.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: „USA Gymnastics bei Jungtinių Valstijų olimpinis ir parolimpinis komitetas turi tą patį tikslą – padaryti gimnastiką ir kitas sporto šakas kuo saugesnes, kad atletai galėtų siekti savo svajonių saugioje, pozityvioje ir įgalinančioje aplinkoje.
mt: "USA Gymnastics and the United States Olympic and Paralympic Committee have the same goal: to make gymnastics and other sports safer so athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and empowering environment."
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Septintajame dešimtmetyje Brzezinskis dirbo Johno F. Kennedžio patarėju, o vėliau Lyndono B. Johnsono administracijoje.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and later in the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Per 1976 m. atrenkamuosius rinkimus jis patarinėjo Karteriui dėl užsienio politikos, tada po Henrio Kisingerio nuo 1977 m. iki 1981 m. dirbo Nacionalinio saugumo patarėju (NSP).
mt: 1976 m. he advised Carter on foreign policy, then after Henry Kissinger from 1977 to 1981 he worked as a National Security Advisor (NSA).
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Dirbdamas NSA, jis Karteriui padėjo diplomatiškai tvarkyti pasaulio reikalus, pvz., pasiekti 1978 m. Kemp Deivido susitarimų; normalizuoti JAV ir Kinijos santykius aštuntojo dešimtmečio pabaigoje; spręsti Irano revoliuciją, po kurios sekės Irano įkaitų krizė 1979 m.; ir sovietų invaziją Afganistane 1979 m.
mt: While at the NSA, he helped Carter diplomatically resolve world issues, such as the 1978 Camp David Accords; normalize U.S. and Chinese relations at the end of the 1970s; deal with the Iranian Revolution, which was followed by the Iranian hostage crisis in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Filmas, kuriame vaidino Ryanas Goslingas ir Emma Stone, buvo nominuotas visose svarbiausiose kategorijose.
mt: 2017 film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Goslingas ir Stone buvo nominuoti geriausio aktoriaus ir aktorės apdovanojimams.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and actress awards.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Kitos nominacijos: geriausias filmas, režisierius, kinematografija, kostiumų dizainas, montažas, originalus garso takelis, scenografija, garso montažas, garso suvedimas ir originalus scenarijus.
mt: Other nominations: Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dvi dainos iš filmo, „Audition“ („The Fools Who Dream“) ir „City of Stars“, gavo nominacijas už geriausią originalią dainą. „Lionsgate“ studija gavo 26 nominacijas – daugiau nei bet kuri kita studija.
mt: 2 songs from the film, “The Fools Who Dream” and “City of Stars”, were nominated for best original song. The Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations – more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Šeštadienio vakarą Jungtinių Valstijų prezidentas Donaldas Trumpas per atstovą spaudai perduotame pareiškime pranešė, kad JAV kariai paliks Siriją.
mt: On Friday evening, United States President Donald Trump announced through a spokesperson that U.S. troops would leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Šis pranešimas buvo paskelbtas po to, kai Trampas telefonu pasikalbėjo su Turkijos prezidentu Redžepu Tajipu Erdoanu.
mt: This message was released after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkija taip pat priimtų saugoti suimtus ISIS kovotojus, kuriuos, pasak pranešimo, Europos valstybės atsisakė repatrijuoti.
mt: Turkey would also take in ISIS fighters, who, according to the report, European states refused to repatriate.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Tai ne tik patvirtina, kad bent kai kurie dinozaurai buvo plunksnuoti (plačiai paplitusi teorija), tačiau suteikia duomenų, kurių fosilijos paprastai suteikti negali, pvz., spalvą ir trimatį išdėstymą.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs were feathered (a widely held theory), but also provides data that fossils usually cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Mokslininkai teigia, kad viršuje šio gyvūno plunksnos buvo rudai kaštoninės, o apačioje - blyškios arba karotenoido spalvos.
mt: Scientists say the bird's feathers were reddish-brown on top and pale or carotenoid-colored on the bottom.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Šis atradimas taip pat suteikia įžvalgų apie plunksnų evoliuciją paukščiuose.
mt: This discovery also sheds light on the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Kadangi dinozaurų plunksnos neturi gerai išsivysčiusios ašies, vadinamos stiebu, tačiau turi kitų plunksnų bruožų (šonines šakeles ir spindulius), tyrėjai padarė išvadą, kad stiebas, tikėtina, evoliuciškai išsivystė vėliau nei šie kiti bruožai.
mt: Because dinosaur feathers lacked well-developed axes, called rami, but had other feather characteristics (lateral shafts and barbs), researchers concluded that rami likely evolved later than these other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Plunksnų struktūra rodo, kad jos buvo naudojamos ne skrendant, bet labiau temperatūrai reguliuoti arba siekiant pasirodyti. Tyrinėtojai mano, kad nors tai yra jauno dinozauro uodega, pavyzdyje matoma suaugusiojo plunksnų danga, o ne paukščiuko pūkeliai.
mt: The feather structure shows that they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or display. Researchers believe that while this is a young dinosaur's tail, the example shows an adult's plumage, not a juvenile's down.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Tyrėjai teigė, kad, nors tai yra jauno dinozauro uodega, mėginys rodo suaugusiojo apsiplunksnavimą, o ne jauniklio pūkus.
mt: Researchers said, although it is a young dinosaur's tail, the attempt shows an adult's feathering, not a juvenile's fuzz.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Dėl sprogusio sprogmens po automobiliu šalia policijos būstinės žuvo du policijos pareigūnai ir sužeista daugiau nei dvidešimt kitų asmenų.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and more than 20 others were injured by the explosion of a bomb near a police station.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Valdytojo biuras nurodė, kad devyniolika iš sužeistųjų buvo policijos pareigūnai.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Policija nurodė įtarianti, kad už ataką atsakingas „Daesh“ (ISIL) aktyvistas.
mt: Police have asked for anyone with information to come forward, saying the attack was carried out by a "Daesh" (ISIL) activist.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Jie aptiko, kad Saulė veikia pagal tuos pačius pagrindinius principus kaip kitos žvaigždės: visų sistemos žvaigždžių aktyvumas priklauso vien tik nuo ryškumo ir sukimosi.
mt: They found that the Sun behaves according to the same basic principles as other stars: the activity of all stellar systems depends only on brightness and rotation.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Pagal skaistį ir sukimąsi nustatomas žvaigždės Rosbio matas, susijęs su plazmos srautu.
mt: The size of the star Rosby is determined by the brightness and the spin.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Kuo mažiau Rossby bangų, tuo žvaigždė yra mažiau aktyvi magnetinių apsisukimų atžvilgiu.
mt: The fewer Rossby waves, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic activity.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Per šią kelionę Iwasaki daug kartų susidūrė su problemomis.
mt: On this trip Iwasaki encountered problems many times.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Jį apiplėšė piratai, Tibete užpuolė pasiutęs šuo, Nepale jis pabėgo iš santuokos, o Indijoje – buvo suimtas.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, a Tibetan dog attacked him, he escaped from marriage in Nepal, and he was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n standartas veikia ir 2,4 GHz, ir 5,0 GHz dažnyje.
mt: 802.11n standard works in both 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequency.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Tai leis jam vėl veikti su 802.11a, 802.11b ir 802.11g, jei pagrindinė stotis turi du radijo ryšius.
mt: 802.11n will allow him to operate with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, if the main station has two radio links.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n sparta yra daug didesnė negu jo pirmtakių ir teoriškai gali pasiekti maksimalaus 600 Mbit/s pralaidumo.
mt: 802.11n speed is much greater than its predecessors and theoretically can reach a maximum of 600 Mbit/s throughput.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Diuvalis, vedęs ir turintis du suaugusius vaikus, nepaliko didelio įspūdžio su istorija susijusiam Mileriui.
mt: Duval, who was married and had two adult children, did not leave a lasting impression with the history associated with Miller.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Paprašytas komentaro, Mileris atsakė: „Mikas posėdžio metu daug kalba... Ruošiausi, todėl, tiesą sakant, negirdėjau, ką jis kalbėjo“.
mt: Asked for comment, Miller responded: "Mike talks a lot during meetings... He's prepared, so, to be honest, I didn't hear what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: „Mes stengsimės sumažinti anglies dioksido emisijas už BVP vienetą žymiu skaičiumi nuo 2005 m. lygio iki 2020 m.“, – teigė Hu.
mt: “We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant amount from 2005 levels to 2020,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Jis nepaminėjo nurėžtų sumų skaičių, sakydamas, kad jie bus paskaičiuoti atsižvelgiant į Kinijos ekonominį pajėgumą.
mt: He did not mention the exact amount of the cuts, saying they would be determined based on China's economic strength.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu besivystančias šalis paragino „pirmiausia vengti seno įpročio teršti ir valyti vėliau“.
mt: The developing country urged "first avoid the old habit of dumping and clean up later".
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Jis pridūrė, kad „vis dėlto negalima jų prašyti prisiimti įsipareigojimų, kurie neatitinka vystymosi etapo, atsakomybės ir gebėjimų“.
mt: He added that "however, they cannot be asked to assume responsibilities that do not match the development stage, accountability and capabilities".
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Šiandien 12.00 val (GMT laiku) Irako studijų grupė pateikė savo ataskaitą.
mt: 12:00 pm (GMT time) Iraqi study group presented its report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Įspėjama, kad šiuo metu niekas negali garantuoti, jog veiksmai Irake sustabdys religinį karą, didėjantį smurtą ar judėjimą link chaoso.
mt: It is warned that at this time no one can guarantee that actions in Iraq will stop religious war, increasing violence or movement towards chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Ataskaita pradedama raginimu pradėti atviras diskusijas ir siekti susitarimo Jungtinėse Valstijose dėl politikos Artimųjų Rytų atžvilgiu.
mt: The report is to begin with a call to open up discussions and seek agreement in the United States on policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Ataskaitoje griežtai kritikuojamas beveik kiekvienas vykdomosios valdžios dabartinės politikos dėl Irako aspektas ir raginama nedelsiant pakeisti veiksmų kryptį.
mt: The report harshly criticizes almost every aspect of the administration's current policy in Iraq and urges a change of course without delay.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Pirma iš jos 78 rekomendacijų yra ta, kad iki šių metų pabaigos turėtų būti imtasi naujos diplomatinės iniciatyvos, siekiant apsaugoti Irako sienas nuo priešiškų intervencijų ir atkurti diplomatinius santykius su jo kaimynais.
mt: 1 of the 78 recommendations is that by the end of this year a new diplomatic initiative should be taken to protect Iraq's borders from hostile interventions and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Šiuo metu einanti senatorės pareigas pirmoji Argentinos ponia Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner apie savo kandidatūrą į prezidento postą paskelbė vakar vakare La Platos mieste, kuris yra už 50 kilometrų (31 mylios) nuo Buenos Airių.
mt: Current acting senator and first lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, a city about 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Kad ketina kandidatuoti į prezidento postą, Kirchner paskelbė Argentinos teatre, ten pat, kur 2005 m. pradėjo savo kampaniją kandidatuodama į Senatą kaip Buenos Airių provincijos delegacijos narė.
mt: To announce her candidacy for president, Kirchner spoke at the Argentine theater where she began her campaign in 2005 as a senatorial candidate for the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Diskusijas sukėlė nesutarimai dėl išlaidų uraganui Katrina palengvinti ir rekonstrukcijai; jas kai kurie fiskaliniai konservatoriai su humoru pavadino „Bušo Naujojo Orleano sandoriu“.
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina relief and reconstruction funding was a source of controversy, with some fiscal conservatives jokingly referring to it as the "Bush New Orleans sandwich".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Liberalai rekonstrukcijos darbus ypač kritikavo dėl to, kad rekonstrukcijos sutartys sudarytos neva tik su Vašingtono įmonėmis.
mt: Liberal critics of the reconstruction efforts have been particularly vocal in their criticism of the fact that reconstruction contracts were awarded only to Washington-based firms.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Į Romą dalyvauti laidotuvėse nuvyko daugiau kaip keturi milijonai žmonių.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Šv. Petro aikštėje vykusiose laidotuvėse dalyvavusių žmonių skaičius buvo toks didelis, kad ne visiems į jas pavyko patekti.
mt: The number of people attending the funeral on St. Peter's Square was so large that not everyone could get in.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Įvairiose Romos vietose įrengta keletas didelių televizijos ekranų, kad žmonės galėtų stebėti ceremoniją.
mt: Large television screens have been set up in various parts of Rome so people can watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Daugelyje kitų Italijos miestų ir kitur, ypač Lenkijoje, buvo surengtos panašios transliacijos, kurias stebėjo daug žmonių.
mt: Similar broadcasts were held in many other Italian cities and elsewhere, especially in Poland, where many people watched.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Istorikai kritikavo ankstesnę FTB politiką dėl netinkamo išteklių panaudojimo lengvai išsprendžiamiems atvejams, ypač pavogtų automobilių atvejams, su tikslu pagerinti agentūros sėkmės rodiklį.
mt: Historians criticized the agency's previous policy of using scarce resources on easily solved cases, especially stolen car cases, with the goal of improving the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongresas 2005 m. fiskaliniu laikotarpiu pradėjo finansuoti nepadorumo iniciatyvą ir nurodė, kad FTB turi skirti 10 agentų suaugusiųjų pornografijai.
mt: 2005 fiscal year, Congress began funding the obscenity initiative and directed FTB to allocate 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa surinko daugiausiai iningų taškų per 70 metimų tik su 41 kamuoliukais, pataikydamas 11 po keturis ir 2 po šešis.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the most runs in 70 innings with just 41 fours, hitting 11 sixes and 2 fours.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Viduriniosios kategorijos mušėjams Sachinui Tendulkarui ir Rahului Dravidui sekėsi gerai ir kartu jie atliko šimtą bėgimų.
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid both had good days and together they completed 100 runs.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Tačiau pralaimėjusi kapitono vartus Indija laimėjo tik 36 taškus, pralaimėjo 7 vartus ir baigė kėlinį.
mt: India lost the captain's end by 36 points, losing 7 wickets and ending the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: JAV Prezidentas Džordžas V. Bušas atvyko į Singapūrą lapkričio 16 d. rytą, taip pradėdamas savaitę truksiantį turą po Aziją.
mt: 16 November 2006, US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning, thus beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Jį pasitiko Singapūro ministro pirmininko pavaduotojas Wong Kan Seng, o prekybos ir terorizmo problemas jis aptarė su Singapūro ministru pirmininku Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He met with Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Po pralaimėjimų savaitės kadencijos vidurio rinkimuose Bušas papasakojo publikai apie prekybos Azijoje plėtrą.
mt: After a week of losses in the mid-session of the Bush administration, Bush told the public about the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Prieš antrąjį svarstymą po antradienį, Ministro Pirmininko kanceliarijoje, vykusio 25 minučių susitikimo su Naujosios Demokratų partijos lyderiu Jacku Laytonu, premjeras Stephenas Harperis sutiko išsiųsti vyriausybės „švaraus oro įstatymą“ visų partijų komitetui peržiūrai.
mt: Before the second reading on Tuesday, after a 25-minute meeting at the Prime Minister's office with New Democratic Party leader Jack Layton, Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's "clean air act" to all-party committee for review.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Susitikęs su premjeru Laytonas paprašė konservatorių aplinkosaugos įstatymo pakeitimų: „kruopštaus ir išsamaus perrašymo“.
mt: Meeting with the premier, Layton asked for changes to the Conservative government's environmental bill: "a thorough and comprehensive rewrite".
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Nuo tada, kai federalinė vyriausybė nusprendė perimti Mersey ligoninės Devonporte, Tasmanijoje, finansavimą, valstijos vyriausybė ir kai kurie federaliniai parlamento nariai kritikavo šį veiksmą kaip triuką prieš prasidedant federaliniams rinkimams, kurie bus paskelbti iki lapkričio.
mt: Since the federal government decided to take over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal parliamentarians have criticized this move as a pre-election stunt, with federal elections to be held before November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Tačiau premjeras Johnas Howardas pasakė, kad įstatymu siekiama tik apsaugoti ligoninės infrastruktūrą, kad Tasmanijos valdžia jos nepablogintų – tam papildomai skiriama 45 milijonai AUD.
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard said the legislation was only intended to protect the hospital's infrastructure, not to close it down – an additional $45 million AUD was allocated for this purpose.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Pasak naujausio biuletenio, jūros lygio rodmenys nurodė susidariusį cunamį. Tikrai buvo užfiksuotas cunamio aktyvumas šalia Pago Pago ir Niujė.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was underway.  A tsunami was definitely observed near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Nepranešta apie Tongoje didžiulę žalą ar sužeistuosius, bet laikinai nebuvo elektros, dėl to, anot pranešimo, Tongos institucijos negavo perspėjimo apie cunamį iš Ramiojo vandenyno cunamių perspėjimo centro.
mt: No reports of damage or casualties in Tonga, but the report says the Tongan institutions did not receive a warning about the tsunami from the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Keturiolika mokyklų Havajuose, įsikūrusių pakrantėje arba šalia jų, buvo uždarytos nuo trečiadienio nepaisant panaikintų įspėjimų.
mt: 13 schools on the island of Hawaii, located on the coast or near it, were closed on Monday despite the cancellation of warnings.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: JAV prezidentas Džordžas V. Bušas teigiamai priėmė pranešimą.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush signed the bill into law.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bušo atstovas spaudai Gordonas Džondro pavadino Šiaurės Korėjos pasižadėjimą „didžiulia pažanga siekiant patikimo nusiginklavimo atominiu ginklu Korėjos pusiasalyje“.
mt: A Bush administration official told reporters North Korea's pledge to make "significant progress" toward verifiable nuclear disarmament on the Korean peninsula was "a big step forward."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Šiandien Atlanto vandenyne susiformavo dešimtoji pavadinimą gavusi Atlanto uraganų sezono audra – subtropinė audra Džeris.
mt: Today, the tenth named storm of the 2013 Atlantic hurricane season formed – subtropical storm Jerry.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Nacionalinis uraganų centras (NHC) teigia, kad šiuo metu Džeris sausumai grėsmės nekelia.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this time, Jerry poses no threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: JAV inžinierių korpusas apskaičiavo, kad 6 colių krituliai gali pralaužti anksčiau pažeistus pylimus.
mt: 6 inches of snow can break weakened levees, according to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Ninth Ward sritis, kuri uragano Katrina metu buvo užtvindyta net iki 20 pėdų aukščio, šiuo metu plyti vandenyje iki juosmens, nes netoliese esantis pylimas buvo užlietas.
mt: 9th Ward area, which was flooded up to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now underwater up to the knee, as the nearby levee was breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Vanduo užlieja pylimą per 100 pėdų plotį.
mt: 100 feet of road is flooded.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Praėjusį mėnesį, kalbėdamas su „Wikinews“, bendrųjų reikalų administratorius Adamas Cuerdenas išreiškė nepasitenkinimą dėl pašalinimo.
mt: Last month, speaking to Wikinews, Adam Cuerden, a generalist administrator, expressed dissatisfaction with the removal.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: „Jis [Velsas] tiesiog mums melavo nuo pat pradžių. Pirma, apsimesdamas, kad tai buvo daroma dėl teisėtų priežasčių. Antra, apsimesdamas, kad klausė mūsų iki pat savo meno panaikinimo.“
mt: “He [Wales] has been lying to us from the start. First, pretending it was done for the right reasons. Second, pretending he was listening to us until his own talent was revoked.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Kilus bendruomenės pykčiui sukurta strategija dėl svetainės, kurioje laikoma milijonai laikmenų su atviro naudojimo licencija, seksualinio turinio.
mt: A strategy to deal with community outrage over a website that hosts millions of files with an open source license, sexual content.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Atlikti darbai daugiausia buvo teoriniai, tačiau programa buvo sukurta siekiant imituoti Šaulio žvaigždyno stebėjimus.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was created to simulate observations of the Sagittarius Dwarf Galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Poveikis, kurio tikėjosi komanda, būtų sukeliamas atoslūgio jėgų tarp galaktikos tamsiosios medžiagos ir Paukščių Tako tamsiosios medžiagos.
mt: The team hoped the effect would be caused by a repulsion of dark matter between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way's dark matter halo.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Kaip Mėnulis traukia žemę, sukeldamas potvynius ir atoslūgius, taip ir Paukščių Takas jėga veikia Šaulio galaktiką.
mt: As the Moon pulls the tides, so the Magellanic Clouds pull the Milky Way.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Mokslininkai padarė išvadą, kad tamsioji materija veikia kitą tamsiąją materiją taip pat, kaip ir bet kuri įprasta materija.
mt: Scientists have found that dark matter interacts with other dark matter in the same way as any other matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Šioje teorijoje teigiama, kad didžioji dalis tamsiosios medžiagos aplink galaktiką yra susitelkusi halo pavidalu ir sudaryta iš daugybės smulkių dalelių.
mt: This theory claims that most of the dark matter around the galaxy is in a halo shape and made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Televizijos pranešimuose matomi iš elektrinės kylantys balti dūmai.
mt: Television reports show white smoke rising from the power plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Vietos valdžios institucijos įspėja gyventojus, kurių namai stovi netoli gamyklos, likti namuose, išjungti oro kondicionierius ir negerti vandentiekio vandens.
mt: Local authorities warn residents living near the plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Remiantis Japonijos branduoline agentūra, elektrinėje aptikta radioaktyvaus cezio ir jodo.
mt: According to the Japanese Atomic Energy Agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were found in the electric grid.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Valdžios institucijos spėja, kad tai rodo, jog konteineriai, kuriuose yra urano degalų, galėjo įtrūkti ir pratekėti.
mt: Government agencies speculate that this may indicate that the containers holding the uranium fuel rods may have leaked and corroded.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll Pietų Afrikos KwaZulu-Natal regione aptiko vaistams ypač atsparią tuberkuliozę (XDR-TB).
mt: Dr. Tony Moll in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal region found a highly resistant form of tuberculosis (XDR-TB).
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Duodamas interviu jis teigė, kad naujasis variantas „kelia labai didelį nerimą dėl labai didelio mirtingumo“.
mt: In an interview he said the new variant "causes great concern because of the very high mortality".
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Kai kurie pacientai galėjo užsikrėsti ligoninėje, mano dr. Mollis; bent du iš jų buvo ligoninės darbuotojai.
mt: Some patients may have contracted the hospital, Dr. Mollis said; at least two were hospital employees.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
